author: Warhammer
description:
Chaos falls on the Realm of Life, and Alarielle the Everqueen mounts a defiant counter.

The Scourge of Ghyran begins – play your part with free downloads for every faction. 

Find out more at https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/2pgti3di/prepare-for-the-next-generals-handbook-with-the-scourge-of-ghyran/
